description: <link=keyword.Drain><style=Keyword>Drain</style></link> 1 from a unit to summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Spiderling</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Drain 1 from a unit to summon a Spiderling.
flavorText: "My... my lady! I didn't realize you were such an... an arachnophile! Could you perhaps call them away from me? L-Lady Elise? Please?" - Lord Sassen, Hapless Aristocrat
name: Vile Feast
